body_html: CUDA 9 builds do seem to work on both Mac and Linux as per #12052, Windows is the only OS it is failing for. It is not clear if this is a Tensorflow bug or an nvcc bug that can be worked around, the messages that are thrown are very none helpful.
body_text: CUDA 9 builds do seem to work on both Mac and Linux as per #12052, Windows is the only OS it is failing for. It is not clear if this is a Tensorflow bug or an nvcc bug that can be worked around, the messages that are thrown are very none helpful.
body: CUDA 9 builds do seem to work on both Mac and Linux as per #12052, Windows is the only OS it is failing for. It is not clear if this is a Tensorflow bug or an nvcc bug that can be worked around, t[he messages that are thrown](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/12052#issuecomment-341887171) are very none helpful.
